Package simulator

Class EventSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.EventSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainSimulator

    public abstract class EventSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Simulator
    This abstract class implements the Simulator, providing a general simulator of time Events. Thus, implements Next() (next Event to be simulated) and has general event container, sorted by order to be simulated.

    Also, contains a generator to provide generated numbers necessary for the simulation, random or not.

    See Also:
    Event

      protected int nb_events_done
